sidebar.title: Navigation Menu
sidebar.description: This is the main side menu. Here you can access all sections of the application, including Dashboard, User Management and Settings.

header.title: Top Bar
header.description: This is the top bar that displays the current section title. You will also find the button to switch between light and dark theme.

themeToggle.title: Theme Toggle
themeToggle.description: Click here to switch between the light and dark theme of the application.

dashboardCards.title: Statistics Cards
dashboardCards.description: These cards show the main dashboard metrics, including total users, revenue, orders and growth rate.

recentActivity.title: Recent Activity
recentActivity.description: In this section you can see the most recent activities and events in the system.
